description: Core GAT commands and datasets curated for MCP onboarding and scripting.

onboarding.name: Refresh docs & start MCP server
onboarding.details: Regenerates every docs target and immediately runs `gat-mcp-docs --docs docs --addr 127.0.0.1:4321`.

commands.name: DC power flow
commands.description: Solve the linear DC approximation quickly to inspect branch flows from a MATPOWER case.

commands.name: AC optimal power flow
commands.command: gat pf ac test_data/matpower/case9.arrow --solver highs --tol 1e-6 --max-iter 20 --out out/ac-opf.parquet
commands.description: Run a nonlinear AC solve with the Highs backend, suitable for verifying solver setup and outputs.

commands.name: DER envelope aggregation
commands.description: Resample telemetry before feeding it into the DERMS scheduling helpers documented under `docs/guide/derms.md`.

commands.name: PTDF analytics
commands.description: Calculate PTDF sensitivities so the new `gat-dist` and `gat-adms` helpers can be verified against line scenarios.

commands.name: Resumable runs
commands.description: Reproduce a prior run from the saved manifest that contains arguments, env, and outputs.

datasets.command: gat dataset public fetch opsd-time-series-2020 --out data/public/opsd
datasets.description: Fetch the curated OPSD dataset for experimenting with time-series joins and DER scheduling.

datasets.command: gat dataset public fetch airtravel --out data/public/airtravel
datasets.description: A compact sequence to test the `gat ts agg` and `gat ts join` commands.

guides.title: ADMS workflows
guides.description: FLISR, VVO, and outage heuristics driven by the `gat-adms` crate.

guides.title: DERMS workflows
guides.description: Schedules, envelopes, and stress-tests powered by `gat-derms`.

guides.title: Distribution & power-flow notes
guides.description: Power-flow and hosting-capacity guidance that `gat-dist` installers can reuse.
